title: To Mum, Gifts from Your Soul: Gifts that Inspire Love and Gratitude
description: My intention was to give a heartfelt gift to my mother; it also turned out to be one of the greatest gifts I gave to myself.  By focusing on the abundance of small acts of love from my mother, many grudges and issues I previously replayed over and over in my mind throughout my life washed away in an ocean of tears.
author: Lexa Harpell
